name: Prophetic Dreams
description: Training in recognizing and interpreting visions received through dreams.

cards.title: Enhancing Dream Recall
cards.description: Practices to retain and analyze symbolic messages from the subconscious.
cards.bulletpoints: Dream Journaling, Lucid Dream Triggers, Intention Setting
cards.summaryText: Prime recall with journaling and lucid cues so dream symbols stay vivid on waking.

cards.title: Deciphering Prophetic Visions
cards.description: Interpreting future-oriented dream sequences and signs.
cards.bulletpoints: Pattern Recognition, Symbolic Archetypes, Intuition Calibration
cards.summaryText: Trace recurring symbols and tune intuition to sift prophecy from dream static.
